task_description:
# 2.2 Create ChecklistInstance model for filled checklists

**Linear Issue:** [BUI-26](https://linear.app/builder-project/issue/BUI-26/22-create-checklistinstance-model-for-filled-checklists)
**Priority:** Medium
**Status:** Backlog


## Description

Create SQLAlchemy models for checklist instances (filled checklists).

**Models to add to backend/app/models/checklist_template.py:**

1. **ChecklistInstance:**

* id: UUID
* project_id: FK to Project
* template_id: FK to ChecklistTemplate
* area_id: Optional\[FK to ConstructionArea\] (apartment/unit)
* unit_identifier: Optional\[str\] (apartment number)
* status: enum (not_started, in_progress, completed, approved)
* started_at: datetime
* completed_at: Optional\[datetime\]
* completed_by: FK to User
* additional_data: JSONB (flexible extra data)
* created_at, updated_at
* responses: relationship

2. **ChecklistItemResponse:**

* id: UUID
* instance_id: FK to ChecklistInstance
* item_template_id: FK to ChecklistItemTemplate
* status: enum (pending, passed, failed, na)
* note: Optional\[str\]
* image_file_ids: JSONB (list of file IDs)
* signature_file_id: Optional\[UUID\]
* responded_by: FK to User
* responded_at: datetime
* additional_data: JSONB (flexible extra data)
